column2: Lore of the Heavens Magic Phase.
Begin [Root.GetBestName]'s Lore of the Heavens battle phase.

To wield the Lore of the Heavens is to wield the power of the cosmos, to channel forces even more arcane than other more celestially bound magics. You call forth the devestating furies of the heavens, and even augur the future to your advantage. The penultimate power of mage of the heavens is to call down a Comet and shatter asunder the earth and the armies that dare defy your power.
To call a chain of lightning is to unleash a primal terror on your enemies.
Harmonic Convergence bends fate to your favour.
Storm of the Ancients, an uncontrollable disaster that moves at its will.
Comet of Cassondora is a powerful random strike of utmost devestation.
Chaing Lightning is to an unleashed fury that hits a random number of times, potentially obliterating entire armies.
